register.title: Create Organization
register.cardDescription: Fill in the information below to create your organization
register.name: Organization Name
register.logoDescription: Upload a square logo for your organization. Recommended size: 512x512px
register.logoUploadError: Failed to upload logo. Please try again.
register.logoUrlDescription: Or provide a logo URL instead of uploading
register.visibilityDescription: Control who can view your organization
register.visibilityPublicDescription: Anyone can view and discover your organization
register.visibilityPrivateDescription: Only members can view your organization

validation.nameMaxLength: Organization name must be less than 100 characters
validation.slugMaxLength: Slug must be less than 100 characters
validation.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
validation.websiteUrlMaxLength: Website URL must be less than 512 characters
validation.logoUrlMaxLength: Logo URL must be less than 512 characters
